dataList.lowMoraleDescription:
- Deal +([NervousImpairment] on target / 2)% damage (max 15%)
- Turn Start: gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] and 2 [Vulnerable]
dataList.panicDescription:
- Deal +([NervousImpairment] on target)% damage (max 30%)
- Turn Start: gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] and 3 [Vulnerable]

dataList.lowMoraleDescription: Turn End: consume 3% HP to apply 1 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable] to all allies
dataList.panicDescription: Turn End: consume 5% HP and gain 1 [Vulnerable] to apply 1 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable] to all allies

All Resistances change to 'Normal'
Double the amount of [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], and [Burst] Potency gained due to Skill effects
